questions.question: .......................... she said made no sense to me.
questions.description: What means the thing that which.

questions.question: All ............................ I want is something to eat.
questions.description: The relative pronoun that can refer to things. It is common after all, any etc.

questions.question: She got married again after two months, ................................. made her parents angry.
questions.description: Which can modify an entire clause.

questions.question: He has acted in a movie ............................. name I don't remember.
questions.description: Whose replaces pronouns like his, her, its. He has acted in a movie. I don't remember its name. He has acted in a movie whose name I don't remember.

questions.question: He has acted in a movie the name of ............................ I can't remember.
questions.description: The name of which means the same as whose name.

questions.question: He married a highly successful business woman ............................... you may have heard of.
He married a rich heiress of ............................... you may have heard.
You know Mary ................................. mother is a writer?
I went to see some old neighbors .............................. children I used to play with when I was small.
Where is the girl ............................... sells books?
questions.description: In identifying relative clauses, that can refer to people in an informal style.

questions.question: Where is Janaki ................................. sells tickets?
questions.description: That cannot be used in non-identifying relative clauses.
